question: 借り手
sourceMnemonic:
Remember how <ja>手</ja> can mean "doer" in some words? So here, you have <kanji>borrow</kanji> <kanji>doer</kanji>, or more simply <vocabulary>borrower</vocabulary>.

This word is often used to specifically refer to borrowers in contrast to lenders.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You'll want to know the words <ja>借りる</ja> and <ja>手</ja> to be able to read this one. Combine them to know the reading.
